query: Hey, what was Sarah's specific coffee order again? I want to surprise her.

memories.content: Sarah told me last week that her absolute favorite coffee is a large iced caramel macchiato with oat milk. She gets it almost every time.
I saw Leo at the gym this morning. He mentioned he's planning to visit his parents next weekend.
My sister, Emily, was asking for advice on what color to paint her kitchen cabinets. She's leaning towards a light grey.

expected_response: Sarah's absolute favorite coffee order is a large iced caramel macchiato with oat milk. (From memory: 'Sarah told me last week that her absolute favorite coffee is a large iced caramel macchiato with oat milk. She gets it almost every time.')
